summary: The penis is the male external sex organ, used for urination and sexual reproduction. It has several parts: root, body, shaft skin, and foreskin. The body contains three columns of tissue, with the urethra running through the middle one. During sexual excitement, the penis can become erect, growing in size and stiffness. Erections can also happen when not sexually aroused, especially during adolescence and sleep. The average erect penis length is just over 5 inches. Some people choose to modify their penises with circumcision or piercings.
title: Human penis
